en_title: UK Court Overturns Ban on Palestinian Activist Group
cn_title: 英國法院推翻對巴勒斯坦活動組織的禁令
en_summary: A London court ruled that the government decision to ban Palestine Action was disproportionate. A victory for free speech and protest rights.
cn_summary: 倫敦法院裁定，政府取消禁止「巴勒斯坦行動」組織的決定是不相稱的。這是言論自由和抗議權利的勝利。
